name: Azure_Region_Violation
description: This policy enables you to restrict the locations your organization can specify when deploying resources. Use to enforce your geo-compliance requirements. Excludes resource groups, Microsoft.AzureActiveDirectory/b2cDirectories, and resources that use the 'global' region.
content:
{
 "policyType": "BuiltIn",
 "mode": "Indexed",
 "metadata": {
 "policy_id": "/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/policyDefinitions/e56962a6-4747-49cd-b67b-bf8b01975c4c",
 "policy_description": "This policy enables you to restrict the locations your organization can specify when deploying resources. Use to enforce your geo-compliance requirements. Excludes resource groups, Microsoft.AzureActiveDirectory/b2cDirectories, and resources that use the 'global' region.",
 "classification": "Operation",
 "sub_classification": "Standards",
 "resource_type": [
 "Subscription"
 ],
 "severity": "high",
 "uri": "policy/azure_policy/global/azure/compliance/others/LgWbX"
 },
 "parameters": {
 "listOfAllowedLocations": {
 "type": "Array",
 "allowedValues": [
 "northcentralus",
 "germanywestcentral",
 "centralindia",
 "uksouth",
 "westusstage",
 "asiapacific",
 "japaneast",
 "eastasiastage",
 "germanynorth",
 "westcentralus",
 "brazilsouth",
 "japan",
 "southafricawest",
 "uaecentral",
 "canadaeast",
 "norwayeast",
 "francecentral",
 "norwaywest",
 "uaenorth",
 "centralus",
 "francesouth",
 "centralusstage",
 "southcentralusstage",
 "eastus2",
 "koreasouth",
 "canadacentral",
 "westindia",
 "australiacentral2",
 "southafricanorth",
 "unitedstates",
 "europe",
 "switzerlandwest",
 "westus2stage",
 "australia",
 "northeurope",
 "koreacentral",
 "westus2",
 "southcentralus",
 "eastus2euap",
 "australiacentral",
 "westeurope",
 "westus",
 "northcentralusstage",
 "eastus2stage",
 "australiasoutheast",
 "southindia",
 "eastus",
 "ukwest",
 "australiaeast",
 "switzerlandnorth",
 "uk",
 "centraluseuap",
 "japanwest",
 "eastasia",
 "southeastasia"
 ],
 "metadata": {
 "description": "The list of locations that can be specified when deploying resources.",
 "strongType": "location",
 "displayName": "Allowed locations"
 }
 }
 },
 "policyRule": {
 "if": {
 "allOf": [
 {
 "field": "location",
 "notIn": "[parameters('listOfAllowedLocations')]"
 },
 {
 "field": "location",
 "notEquals": "global"
 },
 {
 "field": "type",
 "notEquals": "Microsoft.AzureActiveDirectory/b2cDirectories"
 }
 ]
 },
 "then": {
 "effect": "audit"
 }
 }
}
